@ 3600 MX 5 mx1.%zone%.
@ 3600 MX 10 mx2.%zone%.
@ 3600 TXT This zone brought to you by %driver%!

mx2 3600 A 127.0.0.3
jabber 3600 A 127.0.0.4
ns1 3600 A 127.0.0.5
ns1 3600 AAAA ::1
voip 3600 A 127.0.0.6
www 3600 CNAME www1.%zone%
